definition: abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: Zhang Shizhao was a famous statesman and political critic in modern Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 章士钊是我国近现代史上著名的政治活动家和政论家。

sentences.english: Liang Qichao was a famous activist and statesman in mod ern China.
sentences.chinese: 梁启超近代中国著名的报刊活动家和政论家。

sentences.english: The Chinese Progress is one of the most famous political comment newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 《时务报》是近代著名的政论报刊之一。

sentences.english: That's the political treatise written in 1642.
sentences.chinese: 这是1642年写成的一篇政论。

sentences.english: Political writings play an increasingly important role in the political life of people.
sentences.chinese: 政论文在人们的政治生活中发挥着举足轻重的作用。

sentences.english: He did not receive them. A technocrat met them instead.
sentences.chinese: 他没接见他们，而去见了政论家。

definition: current politics/political situation of the time
to compose (a piece of writing)/to write/(written) work/writer
essay on current affairs submitted to the emperor as policy advice (old)
to critique/to voice concerns about/ancient form of acupuncture using sharp stones as needles
